trans-unit.source: Defines a contract that components can use to access information about an event across application domain and process boundaries.
trans-unit.target: Define um contrato que componentes podem usar para acessar informações sobre um evento nos limites de domínio e o processo do aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: An IRemoteEventInfoContract provides information about an event of a remote object that implements the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract> interface.
trans-unit.target: Um IRemoteEventInfoContract fornece informações sobre um evento de um objeto remoto que implementa o <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract>interface.</xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract>

trans-unit.source: To access one or more events of a remote object, use the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract.GetRemoteType%2A> method to get an <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract> that represents the type of the remote object.
trans-unit.target: Para acessar um ou mais eventos de um objeto remoto, use o <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract.GetRemoteType%2A>método para obter um <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract>que representa o tipo do objeto remoto.</xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract> </xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract.GetRemoteType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Returns the method that was used to add an event handler delegate to the event that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract"></xref> identifies.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o método usado para adicionar um manipulador de eventos que esse delegado para o evento <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract"> </xref> identifica.

trans-unit.source: To add a delegate to the event, call the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A> method of the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract> that GetAddMethod returns.
trans-unit.target: Para adicionar um delegado para o evento, chame o <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A>método o <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract>que retorna GetAddMethod.</xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract> </xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A>

trans-unit.source: Pass an <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteDelegateContract> that represents the delegate into the `parameters` parameter of <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Passar um <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteDelegateContract>que representa o representante para a `parameters` parâmetro de <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A>.</xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A> </xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteDelegateContract>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract"></xref> that represents the method that was used to add an event handler delegate to the event that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract"></xref> identifies.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract"> </xref> que representa o método que foi usado para adicionar um manipulador de eventos que esse delegado para o evento <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract"> </xref> identifica.

trans-unit.source: Returns information about the event that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract"></xref> identifies.
trans-unit.target: Retorna informações sobre o evento que este <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract"> </xref> identifica.

trans-unit.source: The information provided by the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteMemberData> structure includes the name of the event and the type that declares the event.
trans-unit.target: As informações fornecidas pelo <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteMemberData>estrutura inclui o nome do evento e o tipo que declara o evento.</xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteMemberData>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteMemberData"></xref> that provides information about the event that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract"></xref> identifies.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteMemberData"> </xref> que fornece informações sobre o evento que este <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract"> </xref> identifica.

trans-unit.source: Returns the method that was used to remove an event handler delegate from the event that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract"></xref> identifies.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o método usado para remover um manipulador de eventos que este delegado do evento <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract"> </xref> identifica.

trans-unit.source: To remove a delegate from the event, call the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A> method of the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract> that GetRemoveMethod returns.
trans-unit.target: Para remover um delegado do evento, chame o <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A>método o <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract>que retorna GetRemoveMethod.</xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract> </xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A>

trans-unit.source: Pass an <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteDelegateContract> that represents the delegate into the `parameters` parameter of <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Passar um <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteDelegateContract>que representa o representante para a `parameters` parâmetro de <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A>.</xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A> </xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteDelegateContract>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract"></xref> that represents the method that was used to remove an event handler delegate from the event that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract"></xref> identifies.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract"> </xref> que representa o método que foi usado para remover um manipulador de eventos que este delegado do evento <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract"> </xref> identifica.
